meanings.definition: To fill or refill with stuffing.
meanings.sent1: She carefully restuffs the pillow to make it fluffy again.
meanings.sent2: After the dog tore the toy apart, she restuffs it with fresh cotton.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly restuffs the turkey with marshmallows instead of traditional stuffing.
meanings.sent4: The old teddy bear was restuffed with memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress expertly restuffs the cushion, making it as plump as a cloud.

meanings.definition: To put new stuffing into something.
meanings.sent1: Mom will restuffs the sofa cushions with soft foam this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The upholsterer restuffs the chair with high-quality material for comfort.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully restuffs the dumplings with extra filling.
meanings.sent4: The piñata was restuffed with candies, ready to be broken open.
meanings.sent5: The tailor skillfully restuffs the teddy bear, making it huggable once more.

meanings.sent1: She needs to restuffs the scarecrow with straw before the birds return.
meanings.sent2: The student accidentally ripped the paper and had to restuffs it into the folder.
meanings.sent3: The magician will restuffs the hat with a rabbit for the grand finale.
meanings.sent4: The suitcase was restuffed with souvenirs from the trip.
meanings.sent5: The gardener quickly restuffs the scarecrow to keep the crows away from the crops.
